title: Bug 10403 - Project creation should confirm the bin directory can be scrubbed
OB: When creating a project, there is no confirmation regarding the ability to scrub the bin directory.
EB: When creating a project, there should be a confirmation message indicating that the bin directory can be scrubbed.
SR:
1. Open the project creation page.
2. Fill in the necessary details.
3. Proceed with the project creation process.
4. Look for a confirmation message indicating that the bin directory can be scrubbed.
